Title: Any Way the Wind Blows
Actors: Frank Vercruyssen, Diane De Belder, Eric Kloeck, Natali Broods
Plot: Sort of a low-budget Short Cuts (1993), set in the Flemish port city of Antwerp on a warm day in June. Natalie, her brother Chouki, her boyfriend Walter and his ex Lara, the gallery keeper ...
